# UIFocusSoundIdentifier

**Structure**

An identifier for a focus-related sound.

## Declaration

```swift
struct UIFocusSoundIdentifier
```

## Overview

To assign an identifier to a custom sound file, call the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFocusSystem/register(_:forSoundIdentifier:)] method of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFocusSystem].

## Constants

- **default**: The identifier for the default system sound to play during focus updates.
- **none**: The identifier for disabling sound during a focus update.

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**: Creates an identifier for a focus sound.
- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates an identifier for a focus sound with the specified raw value.

## Getting the sound to play during updates

- **Using custom sounds for focus movement**: Customize the sounds users hear when focus moves.
- **soundIdentifierForFocusUpdate(in:)**: Asks the delegate for the identifier of the sound to play when the object gains focus.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
